channel.title: [PI] - Rotating Npc's
channel.description:
[b]Hi,[/b]
I was wondering how you could rotate npc's [PI]. I don't want every npc face the same direction, but every npc a different direction (manually).
If anyone could please help me, thanks.

item.title: [PI] - Rotating Npc's

item.description:
@Giliam wrote:

Hi,

I was wondering how you could rotate npc’s [PI].
I don’t want every npc face the same direction, but every npc a different direction (manually).

If anyone could please help me, thanks.
